noWebBluetooth.message: This browser does not support Web Bluetooth or it is not enabled.
noWebBluetooth.suggestion: Use a supported browser such as Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.
noWebBluetooth.linux: Web Bluetooth is experimental on Linux and must be manually enabled. Copy the link below and paste it in the address bar.

bluetoothNotAvailable.message: No Bluetooth adapter could be found.
bluetoothNotAvailable.suggestion: Please connect or enable a Bluetooth Low Energy adapter and restart the browser.

noGatt.message: The web browser did not give permission to use Bluetooth Low Energy.
